Headline: #51 51st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 51st/Sacramento.
ShortDescription: Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th  Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Shield
ShortDescription: Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wentworth, Pershing, Wallace, due to street blockage near 35th/Shield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wentworth, Pershing, Wallace then resume their normal route on 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Shield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago  Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Rush
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Rush.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, State, Superior and Michigan.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario and State.

Allow extra travel time.
